sqlMap.delete:
delete ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd where dingdzt = 'A'
creator = #creator#
active = #active#
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdlx in ($dingdlx$)

delete ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdmx where dingdh in (select dingdh from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd where dingdzt = 'A'
creator = #creator#
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdlx in ($dingdlx$) )

delete ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdlj where dingdh in (select dingdh from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd where dingdzt = 'A'
creator = #creator#
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdlx in ($dingdlx$) )
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd set dingdzt = #state#,active = '1',dingdsxczr = #creator#,dingdsxsj = create_time where dingdzt = 'A'
dingdjssj = to_date(#dingdjssj#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
creator = #creator#
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdlx in ($dingdlx$)

update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingd set dingdzt = #state#,active = '1' where dingdzt = 'A'
dingdjssj = to_date(#dingdjssj#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
creator = #creator#
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdlx in ($dingdlx$)

update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdmx set zhuangt = #state#,active = '1' where 1 = 1
zuihwhsj = to_date(#dingdjssj#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
creator = #creator#
sqlMap.select:
select distinct a.lingjbh,a.usercenter,b.xiaohdbh as xiaohd,a.fenpqh as fenpbh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj a,${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd b where (a.waibms in (#C1#,#CD#) or a.mos2 in(#M1#,#MD#)) and a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.fenpqh = b.fenpqbh and b.biaos = 1
a.usercenter = #usercenter#
select qujzxz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_xitcsdy where zidlx = #zidlx# and zidbm = #zidbm#

select to_char(min(xhsj),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') as starttime,to_char(max(xhsj),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi') as endtime from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq where lingjbh = #lingjbh# and xiaohd = #xiaohd# and usercenter = #usercenter# and xuqly ='3'
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb (usercenter,hanzbs,lingjbh,danw,xiaohd,xiaohcbh,tangc,xiaohcrq,xiaohxs,xuqly,chejh,chanx,flag) select usercenter,hanzbs,lingjbh,danw,xiaohd,xiaohcbh,tangc,xiaohcrq,xiaohxs,xuqly,chejh,chanx,flag from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jl where NVL(flag,0) <>2
usercenter = #usercenter# xiaohcrq > #dingdjssj#
sqlMap.select: select usercenter,lingjbh,xiaohdbh as xiaohd,wulbh,fenpqbh as fenpbh,XIAOHCBH,XIAOHCCXBH,ANQKCS,XIANBLLKC,YIFYHLZL,JIAOFZL, ZHONGZZL,XITTZZ as xhdxittzz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjxhd where biaos = 1 and lingjbh = #lingjbh# and xiaohdbh = #xiaohdbh# and usercenter = #usercenter#

select a.usercenter,a.lingjbh,fahd,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,a.xiehztbh,songhpc,mudd, dinghck,mos2,cangkshpc2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,mos,beihsj,beihsjc,gongysfe, dinghcklx,gongyslx,shengcxbh,a.gongysbh,usbzlx as ckusbzlx,usbzrl as ckusbzrl,uclx as ckuclx,b.ucrl as ckucrl, zickbh,b.anqkcsl,xittzz as ckxittzz,ucbzlx as gysucbzlx,c.ucrl as gysucrl,uabzlx as gysuabzlx, uaucgs as gysuaucgs,c.zuixqdl,gongyhth,jianglms,jianglms2,dingdbdzl as ckyifyhlzl, dingdzzzl as ckzhongzzl,yijfzl as ckjiaofzl,d.zhongwmc,d.jihy,d.lingjsx,d.danw,a.shengxsj,a.shengxsj2 from (select * from (select w.usercenter,w.lingjbh,fahd,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,xiehztbh,songhpc,mudd,dinghck, mos2,cangkshpc2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,waibms as mos,beihsj,beihsjc, w.gongyfe as gongysfe,dinghcklx,gongyslx,NVL(fenzxh,shengcxbh) as shengcxbh,w.gongysbh,wulgyyz as jianglms,wulgyyz1 as jianglms2,w.shengxsj,w.shengxsj2 from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj w,${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys g where w.usercenter = #usercenter# and w.fenpqh = #fenpbh# and w.lingjbh = #lingjbh# and (waibms in(#C1#,#CD#) or mos2 in (#M1#,#MD#)) and w.usercenter=g.usercenter and w.lingjbh=g.lingjbh and w.gongysbh=g.gongysbh order by g.ucbzlx ) where rownum < 2) a inner join ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingj d on a.usercenter = d.usercenter and a.lingjbh = d.lingjbh left join ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjck b on (a.mos2 in(#M1#,#MD#) or a.mos = #C1#) and a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.xianbck = b.cangkbh left join ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys c on a.mos in(#C1#,#CD#) and a.usercenter = c.usercenter and a.lingjbh = c.lingjbh and a.gongysbh = c.gongysbh and c.biaos = '1'

select usercenter,lingjbh,fenpqh,fahd,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,xiehztbh,songhpc,mudd,dinghck, mos2,cangkshpc2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,waibms as mos,beihsj,beihsjc, gongyfe as gongysfe,dinghcklx,gongyslx,NVL(fenzxh,shengcxbh) as shengcxbh,gongysbh,jianglms,jianglms2,shengxsj,shengxsj2 from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_wullj where 1 = 1
usercenter = #usercenter# fenpqh = #fenpqh# lingjbh = #lingjbh# gongysbh = #gongysdm#

select usercenter,lingjbh,fahd,mudd,xiaohd,zhizlx,gongysbh,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,xiehztbh,zhongwmc, songhpc,dinghck,mos2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,mos,beihsj,beihsjc,anqkcs,xianbllkc,yifyhlzl,xhdxittzz, jiaofzl,zhongzzl,ckusbzlx,ckusbzrl,ckuclx,ckucrl,shengxsj2,jianglms2,shengxsj,gongyhth,xianbyhlx,xiaohcbh,danw, xiaohccxbh,fenpbh,gongysfe,zuixqdl,gongyslx,dinghcklx,anqkcsl,shengcxbh,gysucbzlx,gysucrl,gysuabzlx,gysuaucgs,jihy from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl where (mos = #CD# or mos2 = #MD#)
usercenter = #usercenter#

select usercenter,lingjbh,fahd,mudd,xiaohd,zhizlx,gongysbh,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,xiehztbh,zhongwmc, songhpc,dinghck,mos2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,mos,beihsj,beihsjc,anqkcs,xianbllkc,yifyhlzl,xhdxittzz, jiaofzl,zhongzzl,ckusbzlx,ckusbzrl,ckuclx,ckucrl,shengxsj2,jianglms2,shengxsj,gongyhth,xianbyhlx,xiaohcbh,danw, xiaohccxbh,fenpbh,gongysfe,zuixqdl,gongyslx,dinghcklx,anqkcsl,shengcxbh,gysucbzlx,gysucrl,gysuabzlx,gysuaucgs,jihy from( select usercenter,lingjbh,fahd,mudd,xiaohd,zhizlx,gongysbh,lujbh,lujmc,zhidgys,jiaofm,beihzq,yunszq,gcbh,xiehztbh,zhongwmc, songhpc,dinghck,mos2,cangkshsj2,cangkfhsj2,beihsj2,xianbck,mos,beihsj,beihsjc,anqkcs,xianbllkc,yifyhlzl,xhdxittzz, jiaofzl,zhongzzl,ckusbzlx,ckusbzrl,ckuclx,ckucrl,shengxsj2,jianglms2,shengxsj,gongyhth,xianbyhlx,xiaohcbh,danw, xiaohccxbh,fenpbh,gongysfe,zuixqdl,gongyslx,dinghcklx,anqkcsl,shengcxbh,gysucbzlx,gysucrl,gysuabzlx,gysuaucgs,jihy from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl where (mos = #CD# or mos2 = #MD#)
usercenter = #usercenter#
order by beihsj desc ) where rownum < 10

select usercenter,lingjbh,max(xiaohd) as xiaohd,max(fahd) as fahd,max(mudd) as mudd,max(zhizlx) as zhizlx, max(lujbh) as lujbh,max(lujmc) as lujmc,max(zhidgys) as zhidgys,max(jiaofm) as jiaofm,max(zhongwmc) as zhongwmc, max(beihzq) as beihzq,max(yunszq) as yunszq,max(gcbh) as gcbh,max(xiehztbh) as xiehztbh, max(songhpc) as songhpc,max(dinghck) as dinghck,max(mos2) as mos2,max(cangkshpc2) as cangkshpc2, max(cangkshsj2) as cangkshsj2,max(cangkfhsj2) as cangkfhsj2,max(beihsj2) as beihsj2,xianbck, max(mos) as mos,max(beihsjc) as beihsjc,max(anqkcs) as anqkcs,max(xianbllkc) as xianbllkc, max(yifyhlzl) as yifyhlzl,max(jiaofzl) as jiaofzl,max(zhongzzl) as zhongzzl,max(chej) as chej, max(xianh) as xianh,max(danw) as danw,max(xqly) as xqly,max(ckusbzlx) as ckusbzlx, max(ckusbzrl) as ckusbzrl,max(ckuclx) as ckuclx,max(ckucrl) as ckucrl,max(gysucbzlx) as gysucbzlx, max(gysucrl) as gysucrl,max(gysuabzlx) as gysuabzlx,max(gysuaucgs) as gysuaucgs,max(shengxsj2) as shengxsj2, max(jianglms2) as jianglms2,max(beihsj) as beihsj,max(jianglms) as jianglms,max(shengxsj) as shengxsj, max(gongyhth) as gongyhth,max(xianbyhlx) as xianbyhlx,max(xiaohcbh) as xiaohcbh,max(jihy) as jihy, max(xiaohccxbh) as xiaohccxbh,max(fenpbh) as fenpbh,max(zuixqdl) as zuixqdl,max(gongyslx) as gongyslx, max(dinghcklx) as dinghcklx,max(anqkcsl) as anqkcsl,max(shengcxbh) as shengcxbh,max(ckxittzz) as ckxittzz, max(ckjiaofzl) as ckjiaofzl ,max(ckzhongzzl) as ckzhongzzl,max(ckyifyhlzl) as ckyifyhlzl,max(gongysbh) as gongysbh from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl where (mos = #C1# or mos2 = #M1#)
usercenter = #usercenter#
group by usercenter,lingjbh,xianbck

select usercenter,chanxck,gongzr,shunxh,riq,shijdkssj,shijdjssj,shijcd from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr = ( select gongzr from (select gongzr from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr < #jisrq# and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# group by gongzr order by gongzr desc ) where rownum < 2) and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# order by shunxh desc
select gongzr from (select gongzr from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr > #gongzr# and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# group by gongzr order by gongzr ) where rownum <= $num$

select gongzr from (select gongzr from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr >= #gongzr# and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# group by gongzr order by gongzr ) where rownum <= $num$

select usercenter,chanxck,gongzr,shunxh,riq,shijdkssj,shijdjssj,shijcd from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr = ( select gongzr from (select gongzr from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where gongzr >= #gongzr# and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# group by gongzr order by gongzr ) where rownum <= 1 ) and usercenter = #usercenter# and chanxck = #shengcxbh# order by shunxh

select usercenter,lingjbh,danw,xiaohd ,xiaohxs, chejh,chanx, xiaohcbh,tangc, xiaohcrq from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
xiaohd = #xiaohd#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
and flag=1 order by xiaohcrq,xiaohcbh,tangc

select a.usercenter,a.chanx,sum(a.xiaohxs) as xiaohxs,b.xianbck,a.lingjbh, max(a.danw) as danw,max(a.chejh) as chejh, a.xiaohcbh,a.tangc,a.xiaohcrq from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb a,${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.xiaohd = b.xiaohd
a.usercenter = #usercenter#
a.lingjbh = #lingjbh#
b.xianbck = #xianbck#
a.xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
and a.flag=1 group by a.usercenter,a.chanx,b.xianbck,a.lingjbh, a.danw,a.chejh, a.xiaohcbh,a.tangc,a.xiaohcrq order by a.xiaohcrq,a.xiaohcbh,a.tangc

select to_char(kaisbhsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as kaisbhsj,to_char(chufsxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as chufsxsj from (select kaisbhsj,chufsxsj from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_xiaohcyssk where 1 = 1
usercenter = #usercenter#
to_date(riq,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#riq#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
shengcxbh = #shengcxbh#
tangc <= #tangc#
kaisbhsj <= to_date(#kaisbhsj#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
chufsxsj <= to_date(#chufsxsj#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')
order by chufsxsj desc) where rownum < 3
select ck.xiehztbz from ckx_cangk ck where ck.usercenter = #usercenter# and ck.cangkbh=#xianbck#

select usercenter,xiehztbh,gcbh,facsj,daohsj,xuh from (select usercenter,xiehztbh,gcbh,facsj,daohsj,xuh from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_yunssk where 1 = 1
usercenter = #usercenter#
xiehztbh = #xiehztbh#
gcbh = #gcbh#
daohsj < to_date(#daohsj#,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
order by daohsj desc) where rownum < 2

select usercenter,lingjbh,cangkdm,kucsl,ziyhqrq,xttzz,dingdlj,jiaoflj,jstzsz,dingdzzlj,anqkc from (select usercenter,lingjbh,cangkdm,kucsl,ziyhqrq,xttzz,dingdlj,jiaoflj,jstzsz,dingdzzlj,anqkc from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb where 1=1
ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
cangkdm = #cangkdm#
order by ziyhqrq desc) where rownum <= 1

select sum(kucsl) from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_ziykzb where 1=1
ziyhqrq = to_date(#ziyhqrq#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh in ($lingjbh$)
cangkdm = #cangkdm#
gongysdm = #gongysdm#
order by ziyhqrq desc

select usercenter,chanxck,gongzr,shunxh,riq,shijdkssj,shijdjssj,shijcd from (select usercenter,chanxck,gongzr,shunxh,riq,shijdkssj,shijdjssj,shijcd from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_ticxxsj where 1 = 1
gongzr > #gongzr#
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanxck = #shengcxbh#
order by gongzr,shunxh ) where rownum <= $num$

select a.usercenter,gongysbh,lingjbh,gongyhth,gongyfe,youxq,a.fayd,shengxsj,shixsj,zuixqdl,cankfz,zhijcjbl,shifyzpch, ucbzlx,ucrl,uabzlx,uaucgs,gaib,neic,shifczlsbz,b.gongsmc,b.leix from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys a ,${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.gongysbh = b.gcbh and a.biaos = '1' and b.gonghlx = '97W' and b.biaos = '1'
a.usercenter = #usercenter#

select usercenter,gongysbh,lingjbh,gongyhth,gongyfe,youxq,fayd,shengxsj,shixsj,zuixqdl,cankfz,zhijcjbl,shifyzpch, ucbzlx,ucrl,uabzlx,uaucgs,gaib,neic,shifczlsbz from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_lingjgys where lingjbh = #lingjbh# and usercenter = #usercenter# and gongysbh = #gongysdm# and biaos = '1'

select id from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdlj where rownum < 2
dingdh = #dingdh# lingjbh = #lingjbh# usercenter = #usercenter# gongysdm = #gongysdm#

select sum(a.xiaohxs) as xiaohxs from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jl a,${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.xiaohd = b.xiaohd and a.lingjbh = #lingjbh# and to_date(a.xiaohcrq,'yyyy-MM-dd')>= to_date(#dingdsxsj#,'yyyy-MM-dd') and flag=2 and xianbck = #xianbck#

select sum(shul) as shul from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdmx where 1 = 1
dingdh = #dingdh# lingjbh = #lingjbh# usercenter = #usercenter# gongysdm = #gongysdm#
select gongsmc,leix from ${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys where usercenter = #usercenter# and gcbh = #gongysdm# and biaos = '1'

select to_char(juedsk,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') from (select rownum rn, juedsk from (select a.usercenter, a.chanxck, b.gongzr, b.xiaohsj, b.juedsk from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CALENDAR_HEBTIME_INFO a, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGZSJMB b where a.hebtimeh = b.hebtimeh and a.usercenter = #usercenter# and a.chanxck = #shengcxbh# and b.juedsk <= (select max(juedsk) from (select a.usercenter, a.chanxck , b.gongzr, b.xiaohsj, b.juedsk from ${dbSchemal3}CKX_CALENDAR_HEBTIME_INFO a, ${dbSchemal3}CKX_GONGZSJMB b where a.hebtimeh = b.hebtimeh and a.usercenter = #usercenter# and a.chanxck = #shengcxbh# and b.juedsk <= to_date(#juedsk#, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) order by juedsk desc)) where rn = $shijNum$ + 1
sqlMap.insert:
merge into ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdlj using (select count(*) co from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdlj where 1 = 1
dingdh = #dingdh# lingjbh = #lingjbh# usercenter = #usercenter# gongysdm = #gongysdm# )b on(b.co<>0) when not matched then insert ( ziyhqrq,uabzlx,tiaozjsz,dingdzzsj,jidyhsl,beihzq,usercenter,lujdm,xittzz,anqkc,gongysfe,jihyz,uabzuclx,p0fyzqxh,LINGJBH, dingdh,uabzucrl,jiaoflj,p1sl,shifyldxh,gongyslx,p4sl,p0sl,dingdnr,shifyldjf,fahd,xiehzt,daixh,danw,id,p3sl,p5sl,p6sl, p7sl,p8sl,p9sl,p1rq,p2rq,p3rq,p4rq,p5rq,p6rq,p7rq,p8rq,p9rq,shifylkc,p2sl,shifylaqkc,dingdlj,fayzq,cangkdm,dinghcj, uabzucsl,yijfl,gongysdm,yugsfqz,kuc,zhongzlj,creator,create_time,zuixqdl,lingjsx,jiaofm,zhidgys,gonghms,active,guanjljjb, heth,usbaozlx,usbaozrl,dingdljddlj) values( to_date(substr(#ziyhqrq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),#uabzlx#,#tiaozjsz# ,to_date(substr(#dingdzzsj#,1,19),'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #jidyhsl#,#beihzq#,#usercenter#,#lujdm#,#xittzz#,#anqkc#,#gongysfe#,#jihyz#,#uabzuclx#,#p0fyzqxh#,#lingjbh#,#dingdh#, #uabzucrl#,#jiaoflj#,#p1sl#,#shifyldxh#,#gongyslx#,#p4sl#,#p0sl#,#dingdnr#,#shifyldjf#,#fahd#,#xiehzt#,#daixh#,#danw#, ${dbSchemal1}DINGDLJ_SEQ.nextval,#p3sl#,#p5sl#,#p6sl#,#p7sl#,#p8sl#,#p9sl#,to_date(substr(#p1rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#p2rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(substr(#p3rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(substr(#p4rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#p5rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(substr(#p6rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(substr(#p7rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(substr(#p8rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),to_date(substr(#p9rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),#shifylkc#,#p2sl#,#shifylaqkc#, #dingdlj#,#fayzq#,#cangkdm#,#dinghcj#,#uabzucsl#,#yijfl#,#gongysdm#,#yugsfqz#,#kuc#,#zhongzlj#,#creator#, To_Timestamp(#create_time#, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss:ff3'),#zuixqdl#,#lingjsx#,#jiaofm#,#zhidgys#,#gonghms#,#active#, #guanjljjb#,#heth#,#usbaozlx#,#usbaozrl#,#dingdljddlj#)
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdlj set p0sl = (select sum(shul) as shul from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdmx where 1 = 1
dingdh = #dingdh# lingjbh = #lingjbh# usercenter = #usercenter# gongysdm = #gongysdm# ),active = 1 where 1 = 1
ID = #id#
usercenter = #usercenter#
gongysdm = #gongysdm#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
dingdh = #dingdh#
sqlMap.select: select a.biaodsl from ${dbSchemal1}ck_lingjgys a,${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.gongysdm = b.gcbh and b.gonghlx = '97W' and b.biaos = '1' and a.usercenter = #usercenter# and a.lingjbh = #lingjbh# and a.gongysdm = #gongysbh#
select zhuangt from (select * from ${dbSchemal1}ckx_anxhandset a where usercenter = #usercenter# order by create_time desc) aa where rownum = 1

select sum(biaodsl) ckLingjlj from ${dbSchemal1}ck_lingjgys a,${dbSchemal3}ckx_gongys b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.gongysdm = b.gcbh and b.gonghlx = '97W' and b.biaos = '1' and a.usercenter = #usercenter# and a.lingjbh = #lingjbh#
select iskaolckjs from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_kuczh where usercenter = #usercenter# and cangk = #cangk#

select anqkcs from ${dbSchemal1}ckx_lingjxhd where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
xiaohdbh = #xiaohdbh#

select anqkcsl from ${dbSchemal1}ckx_lingjck where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
cangkbh = #cangkbh#

select sum(yicxhl) from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_kucjscsb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter# lingjbh = #lingjbh# xiaohd = #xiaohd# jilrq >= to_date(#xiaohsj#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') jilrq < to_date(#xiaohsj2#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')

select sum(yicxhl) from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_kucjscsb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter# lingjbh = #lingjbh# jilrq >= to_date(#xiaohsj#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') jilrq < to_date(#xiaohsj2#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')
and xiaohd in ( select xiaohd from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxjscszjb_jl where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter# lingjbh = #lingjbh# xianbck = #xianbck#
)

select sum(yicxhl) from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_kucjscsb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter# lingjbh = #lingjbh# xiaohd = #xianbck# jilrq >= to_date(#xiaohsj#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') jilrq < to_date(#xiaohsj2#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')

select usercenter, dingdlx, dingdbh, to_char(dingdsxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as dingdsxsj, to_char(dingdjssj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') as dingdjssj, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, beiz1, beiz2, beiz3 from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdjssj where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
dingdbh = #dingdbh#
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_dingdjssj set dingdjssj = to_date(#dingdjssj#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), editor = #creator#,edit_time = sysdate where dingdbh = #dingdbh#
usercenter = #usercenter#
sqlMap.select:
select sum(daijfsl) from ${dbSchemal1}ck_yaonbhl where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh IN ($lingjbh$)
cangkbh = #cangkbh#
and yaohlzt='03'

select sum(daijfsl) from ${dbSchemal1}ck_yaohl where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
lingjbh IN ($lingjbh$)
cangkbh = #cangkbh#
and yaohlzt='03'
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb a set a.flag=1 where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
xiaohd = #xiaohd#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
and (flag is null or flag=0)

update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb a set a.flag=2 where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
lingjbh = #lingjbh#
xiaohd = #xiaohd#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
tangc = #tangc#
xiaohcrq = #xiaohcrq#
and flag=1

update ( select a.flag,a.editor,a.edit_time from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jl a,${dbSchemal1}xqjs_anxmaoxq_jlzjb b where a.usercenter = b.usercenter and a.lingjbh = b.lingjbh and a.xiaohd=b.xiaohd and a.xiaohcbh=b.xiaohcbh and a.tangc=b.tangc and a.xiaohcrq = b.xiaohcrq and b.flag=2 and b.usercenter=#usercenter# ) set flag=2, edit_time=sysdate, editor=#editor#
sqlMap.select:
select usercenter, chanx, gongysbh, xiaohcbh, tangc, dangqtcrq, guijtc, guijtcrq, hebtc, liush from ( select usercenter, chanx, gongysbh, xiaohcbh, tangc, dangqtcrq, guijtc, guijtcrq, hebtc, liush from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_tangchbzjb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
gongysbh = #gongysbh#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
order by dangqtcrq desc ) where rownum <= 1

select usercenter, chanx, liush, xiaohcbh, tangc, xiaohcrq, qislsh, jieslsh, emonsxlsh, smonsxlsh, emonbhlsh, smonbhlsh, beihsj, flag, zhuangt, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, beiz1, beiz2, beiz3, beiz4, beiz5, beiz6, beiz7, emonzclsh, smonzclsh, dangqzcxh, shangxsj from ${dbSchemal1}ck_xiaohcmb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
( (to_date(xiaohcrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_date(#xiaohcrq#,'yyyy-MM-dd') and tangc >= #tangc# ) or (to_date(xiaohcrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') > to_date(#xiaohcrq#,'yyyy-MM-dd')) )
order by xiaohcrq,tangc
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_tangchbzjb( usercenter, chanx, gongysbh, xiaohcbh, tangc, dangqtcrq, guijtc, guijtcrq, hebtc, liush ) values( #usercenter#, #chanx#, #gongysbh#, #xiaohcbh#, $tangc$, #dangqtcrq#, $guijtc$, #guijtcrq#, $hebtc$, $liush$ )
sqlMap.select:
select usercenter, chanx, gongysbh, xiaohcbh, tangc, dangqtcrq, guijtc, guijtcrq, hebtc, liush from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_tangchbzjb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
gongysbh = #gongysbh#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
order by dangqtcrq desc,xiaohcbh,tangc
sqlMap.delete:
delete ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_tangchbzjb where 1=1
usercenter = #usercenter#
chanx = #chanx#
gongysbh = #gongysbh#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
to_date(dangqtcrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_date(#dangqtcrq#,'yyyy-MM-dd')
sqlMap.select: select usercenter, C1, CD, M1, MD from ${dbSchemal1}ckx_usercenterset where usercenter = #usercenter#

select usercenter, gongysbh, shengcxbh, xiaohcbh, qistc, hebtc, ishunt, biaos, creator, to_char(create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as create_time, editor, to_char(edit_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as edit_time, beiz1, beiz2, beiz3 from ${dbSchemal1}CKX_GONGYSXHC where HEBTC > 0
usercenter = #usercenter#
gongysbh = #gongysbh#
shengcxbh = #shengcxbh#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
biaos = #biaos#

select usercenter, gongysbh, shengcxbh, xiaohcbh, qistc, hebtc, ishunt, biaos, creator, to_char(create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as create_time, editor, to_char(edit_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi') as edit_time, beiz1, beiz2, beiz3 from ${dbSchemal1}CKX_GONGYSXHC WHERE hebtc IS NOT NULL AND hebtc > 0 AND qistc IS NOT NULL AND qistc > 0
usercenter = #usercenter#
gongysbh = #gongysbh#
shengcxbh = #shengcxbh#
xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh#
biaos = #biaos#
sqlMap.delete: delete ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_tangchbzjb WHERE usercenter = #usercenter# AND chanx = #chanx# AND gongysbh = #gongysbh# AND xiaohcbh = #xiaohcbh# AND ((to_date(guijtcrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#xiaohcrq#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND GUIJTC >= #tangc#) OR (to_date(guijtcrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_date(#xiaohcrq#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (to_date(guijtcrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') < trunc(SYSDATE-1)))
